titles: By the King a proclamation. William R. Whereas His Majesty hath received information upon oath, that the persons hereinafter named have with divers other wicked and traiterous persons entred into a horrid and detestable conspiracy, to assassinate and murder his Majesties sacred person ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William, III, King of England, 1650-1702.
publisher: Re-printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson printer to His most excellent Majesty,
notes: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Dated: Given at Our Court at Kensington the twenty third day of February 169⁵/₆. In the eighth year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: William, --  III, --  King of England, 1650-1702 --  Assassination attempt, 1696 --  Early works to 1800.
